name: Import a Slack Account with a taken email address
precondition:
Slack Import test files are kept in Google Drive here
You will use the above files for the tests.
It is important you have an account on the Slack team before exporting, so you can test claiming a Mattermost account imported from Slack.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
Import a Slack Account with a taken email address
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. The Slack team has an account with the `bot@mattermost.com` address
  2. Import the Slack team to rc.test server, which has an existing `bot@mattermost.com` account  ( Please see How to Import Slack )
inline.expectedResult: • In the import summary, it says the account was merged with the existing account.
